Rules.Name: Rest
Rules.Predicate: contextswrl:Person(?person) ^ contextswrl:Sit(?A1) ^ contextswrl:isInvolvedIn(?person, ?A1) ^ contextswrl:LowContextActivity(?llca) ^ contextswrl:isInvolvedIn(?person, ?llca) -> sqwrl:select(?person) ^ sqwrl:count(?llca) ^ sqwrl:columnNames("Person", "NumberLLCActivities")
Rules.Description: Discovery of the having meal activity.

Rules.Name: Conversation
Rules.Predicate: contextswrl:Person(?person) ^ contextswrl:Talk(?A1) ^ contextswrl:isInvolvedIn(?person, ?A1) ^ contextswrl:LowContextActivity(?llca) ^ contextswrl:isInvolvedIn(?person, ?llca) -> sqwrl:select(?person) ^ sqwrl:count(?llca) ^ sqwrl:columnNames("Person", "NumberLLCActivities")
Rules.Description: Discovery of the having meal activity.
